wesm commented on pull request #5464: ARROW-6634: [C++] Vendor Flatbuffers and check in compiled sources
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5464
 
 
   I added convenience scripts to build-support to update the compiled sources and to re-vendor Flatbuffers when we want to upgrade versions in the future.

   ```sh
   ARROW_HOME=$(cd $(dirname $BASH_SOURCE)/../..; pwd)
   ```

   > The diff coverage is `n/a`.

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description: Flatbuffers is small enough that we can vendor {{flatbuffers/flatbuffers.h}} and check in the compiled files to make flatbuffers_ep unneeded
fields.summary: [C++] Do not require flatbuffers or flatbuffers_ep to build
